tool.name: Filtering
tool.command:
filter.py --control $infile_control --affected $infile_affected --oaffected $oaffected --ocontrol $ocontrol
#if float(str($pvalue)) != 0.0: --pvalue $pvalue #end if #if int(str($min_cov)) != 0: --min-coverage $min_cov #end if #if int(str($max_cov)) != 0: --max-coverage $max_cov #end if #if int(str($min_delta_methylation)) != 0: --min-delta-methylation $min_delta_methylation #end if #if float(str($quantil)) != 0.0: --quantil $quantil #end if

param.name: pvalue
param.label: P-value (Fisher Exact Test) per methylation site
param.help: maximal pvalue to classify a site as differential methylated. (0.0 means no test)

validator.message: Value needs to be between 0 and 1.

param.name: min_delta_methylation
param.label: minimal delta between the two mehylation states

param.name: quantil
param.label: coverage quantil filter, example for the 99.9 quantil: 0.999

validator.message: Value needs to be between 0.0 and 1.0
